# isSupported

**Type Property**

A Boolean values that indicates whether a device supports the room-tracking provider.

## Declaration

```swift
static var isSupported: Bool { get }
```

## Type properties

- **requiredAuthorizations**: An array of authorization types the room-tracking provider requires.
